mapper.select: SELECT pc.product_name , od.product_id , od.quantity , od.unit_price FROM order_details od LEFT JOIN product_code pc ON od.product_id = pc.product_code WHERE member_number = #{refundNumber} AND order_number = #{orderNumber} ORDER BY product_id
